name: Building Blocks / Master Builder of Egypt
description: Building Blocks is a physics-based game of a special kind. Be a master-builder in Ancient Egypt!
minimum_requirements: OS: Minimum Windows XP SP3 Operating System. Supports Vista, 7, 8 and 10 Processor: 200 Mhz Pentium processor or higher Memory: 550 MB RAM Graphics: Must support minimum of Direct3D 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 116 MB available space Sound Card: - Additional Notes: -
